main event: A civilian reported a sighting of a circular, flame-colored object in Pasco, Washington on October 4, 1966.
interesting points: The object was described as having a flat base and rocking slightly,The object appeared engulfed in flames with no discernable tail,It was observed for approximately 1.5 minutes,The observation was witnessed by at least one person outside a building,No photographs or physical evidence were collected.
witness description: a civilian and possibly others outside a building
